mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM tbl_commodity_information
and commodity_name like CONCAT('%',#{commodityName},'%' )
and supplier_name like CONCAT('%',#{supplierName},'%')
and supplier_phone like CONCAT('%',#{supplierPhone},'%')
and commodity_mn like CONCAT('%',#{commodityMn},'%')
and status like CONCAT('%',#{status},'%')
